summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 CHEVROLET COBALT. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE POWER STEERING WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED ON THE INSTRUMENT PANEL. THE VIN WAS SERVICED UNDER NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 10V073000 (STEERING), BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED TWICE. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE DEALER, BUT WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 97,850.   UPDATED 02/12/16*LJ  THE CONSUMER HAD THE VEHICLE TOWED TO THE DEALER. A DIAGNOSIS REVEALED AN ISSUE WITH THE FUSE BLOCK. HOWEVER, HE WAS TWO BLOCKS FROM THE DEALER, WHEN THE STEERING FAILED AGAIN.  UPDATED 03/09/16. *JB  THE CONSUMER STATED HE HAS EXPERIENCED POWER STEERING FAILURE FOUR TIMES. UPDATED 03/15/16.*JB UPDATED 4/24/18*JB  *TR
